name: FF.NET Tweaked
description: Gets rid of story cover images and avatars, the color backgrounds for dropdown menus, the Share links, and the redundant Follow/Favorite area below the review box. Changes the width to something more flexible for both widescreen & smallscreen users. Prevents horizontal scrolling when you bring up the search menu. Fixes the stories that are. for some ungodly reason. entirely center-aligned.
additional_info: A kludge of various tweaks and styles, cobbled together and set loose upon the world like Frankenstein's monster. Put style 49854, style 66887, and style 66837 in a blender and this is what you get.
